Name: Nefertem
Description: This bronze statuette represents the infant god Nefertem, son of Ptah and Sekhmet.These divinities together formed the famous triad of Memphis. Nefertem, god of perfumes and unguents, wears a crown in the form of a lotus calyx, enlarged by two menat necklace counterpoises.
